title: Meta Ads Expert
job_overview:
We are hiring for a full-time role to manage ad campaigns end-to-end. Responsibilities include:
• Setup, monitoring, optimization, reporting, and coordination
• Working across restricted niches (experience preferred)
• Using Asana for task management
• Communicating with clients and vendors via IM channels
• Prompt task/message acknowledgment
• Keeping leadership informed of delays/issues
• Continuous attention to campaigns required
